meanings.definition: To fill or supply with something
meanings.sent1: She repletes the bird feeder with seeds every morning.
meanings.sent2: The chef repletes the soup pot with fresh ingredients.
meanings.sent3: The magician repletes his hat with endless surprises.

meanings.sent5: The farmer repletes the barn with bales of hay for the winter.
